2012-12-14	ap_kur_baa_tan_0001_aug12_8_toba_a_2012-12-12	Tobacco	Adopt IPM practices 
\nSpray Spodoptera NPV 250 LE / ha
\nIn early instars SprayChlorpyriphos @ 2.5 ml or Quinalphos @ 2 ml or Thidecarb @ 1 gm or Novuluron @ 1 ml per Lt.  
\nArrange Bird perches @ 10 / ac
\nUse Poison bait for grown up larvae
\nRice bran 5kg + Jaggery 0.5 kg + Monocrotophos 500 ml or chlorpyriphos 500 ml or Methomyl 300 ml. Mix thoroughly with water, make small balls & apply in evening hours for one acre.
\n

2013-01-17	ap_kar_sai_ram_0005_nov12_22_grou_a_2012-01-15	Groundnut	Adopt IPM practices 
\nSpray Spodoptera NPV 250 LE / ha
\nIn early instars SprayChlorpyriphos @ 2.5 ml or Quinalphos @ 2 ml or Thidecarb @ 1 gm or Novuluron @ 1 ml per Lt.  
\nArrange Bird perches @ 10 / ac
\nUse Poison bait for grown up larvae
\nRice bran 5kg + Jaggery 0.5 kg + Monocrotophos 500 ml or chlorpyriphos 500 ml or Methomyl 300 ml. Mix thoroughly with water, make small balls & apply in evening hours for one acre.

2015-11-20	ts_med_jin_gum_0007_sep15_0_ridg_a_2015-11-18	Ridgegourd	For the control of the fruit fly install Methyl Eugenol traps . Fruits become ripen and the insect will eat the contents int the fruit.For the traps put Methyl eugenol 5 ml + malathion 5 ml in water bottle or in a cover. make 3-4 holes and place them in the field at least 10-12.The chemical prepared with 5 grams of dried fish powder along with 1 ml Dichlorovos  can also be used as a bait.For every 20 days the chemical should be changed. these traps should be placed before the flowering season.

2015-11-25	ts_med_war_war_0021_aug15_0_ridg_a_2015-11-24	Ridgegourd	For the control of the fruit fly install Methyl Eugenol traps . Fruits become ripen and the insect will eat the contents int the fruit.For the traps put Methyl eugenol 5 ml + malathion 5 ml in water bottle or in a cover. make 3-4 holes and place them in the field at least 10-12.The chemical prepared with 5 grams of dried fish powder along with 1 ml Dichlorovos  can also be used as a bait.For every 20 days the chemical should be changed. these traps should be placed before the flowering season.

2015-12-03	ts_med_gaj_ahm_0028_sep15_11_ridg_a_2015-12-01	Ridgegourd	For the control of the fruit fly install Methyl Eugenol traps . Fruits become ripen and the insect will eat the contents int the fruit.For the traps put Methyl eugenol 5 ml + malathion 5 ml in water bottle or in a cover. make 3-4 holes and place them in the field at least 10-12.The chemical prepared with 5 grams of dried fish powder along with 1 ml Dichlorovos  can also be used as a bait.For every 20 days the chemical should be changed. these traps should be placed before the flowering season.

Fruits become ripen and the insect will eat the contents int the fruit.For the traps put Methyl eugenol 5 ml + malathion 5 ml in water bottle or in a cover. make 3-4 holes and place them in the field at least 10-12.The chemical prepared with 5 grams of dried fish powder along with 1 ml Dichlorovos can also be used as a bait.For every 20 days the chemical should be changed. these traps should be placed before the flowering season. 2016-01-11	ts_ran_sha_pro_0007_oct15_0_bott_a_2016-01-09	Bottlegourd	 \tFor the control of the fruit fly install Methyl Eugenol traps . Fruits become ripen and the insect will eat the contents int the fruit.For the traps put Methyl eugenol 5 ml + malathion 5 ml in water bottle or in a cover. make 3-4 holes and place them in the field at least 10-12.The chemical prepared with 5 grams of dried fish powder along with 1 ml Dichlorovos can also be used as a bait.For every 20 days the chemical should be changed. these traps should be placed before the flowering season. 2016-01-30	ts_ran_sha_tan_0005_jan16_0_bott_a_2016-01-30	Bottlegourd	 \tFor the control of the fruit fly install Methyl Eugenol traps . Fruits become ripen and the insect will eat the contents int the fruit.For the traps put Methyl eugenol 5 ml + malathion 5 ml in water bottle or in a cover. make 3-4 holes and place them in the field at least 10-12.The chemical prepared with 5 grams of dried fish powder along with 1 ml Dichlorovos can also be used as a bait.For every 20 days the chemical should be changed. these traps should be placed before the flowering season. For the Nutrient deficiency spray multiplex 2 ml . For the control of Serpentine leaf minor Spray NSKE 5 % after one week triazophos (hostathion) 2 ml or . Install yellow sticky traps For Fruit rot spray copper oxy chloride 3 grams or mancozeb 2 ml
\nfor the control of downy mildew spray 2.5 grams of mancojeb or metalaxyl 2 grams per lit of water.

Fruits become ripen and the insect will eat the contents int the fruit.For the traps put Methyl eugenol 5 ml + malathion 5 ml in water bottle or in a cover. make 3-4 holes and place them in the field at least 10-12.The chemical prepared with 5 grams of dried fish powder along with 1 ml Dichlorovos can also be used as a bait.For every 20 days the chemical should be changed. these traps should be placed before the flowering season. 2016-02-09	ts_ran_sha_tan_0005_jan16_0_bott_a_2016-02-08	Bottlegourd	 \tFor the control of the fruit fly install Methyl Eugenol traps . Fruits become ripen and the insect will eat the contents int the fruit.For the traps put Methyl eugenol 5 ml + malathion 5 ml in water bottle or in a cover. make 3-4 holes and place them in the field at least 10-12.The chemical prepared with 5 grams of dried fish powder along with 1 ml Dichlorovos can also be used as a bait.For every 20 days the chemical should be changed. these traps should be placed before the flowering season. 2016-05-12	ts_ran_sha_bul_0015_mar16_0_bott_a_2016-05-11	Bottlegourd	 \tFor the control of the fruit fly install Methyl Eugenol traps . Fruits become ripen and the insect will eat the contents int the fruit.For the traps put Methyl eugenol 5 ml + malathion 5 ml in water bottle or in a cover. make 3-4 holes and place them in the field at least 10-12.The chemical prepared with 5 grams of dried fish powder along with 1 ml Dichlorovos can also be used as a bait.For every 20 days the chemical should be changed. these traps should be placed before the flowering season. \nFOR ANGULAR LEAF SPOT - spray streptocycline 0.1 g + COC 3.0 g per lt. repeat 2 - 3times at fortnightly intervals 
\nSQUARE BURNING - SPRAY BORAX @ 1.0 TO 1.5 gr PER Lt. 2 SPRAYS AT WEEKLY INTERVAL.
